xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/195843-Blur: Live at Glastonbury 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gQyS9gnd7FO7ASBUx9IYqi9MCrY.jpg The high profile reunion of Britpop group Blur reached fever pitch when it was announced that they would be closing the Pyramid Stage in 2009. An emotional Damon Albarn gave a charged performance that went through the highlights of their back catalogue. A fitting end to a Glastonbury festival that many claim to have been 'the best ever'. Blur: Live at Glastonbury
